post.text: The Central Park Five were exonerated. What does it say about Trump that he thinks they should still be in prison?

comment.author: Katie
comment.text: Dear Hillary, You need the UN or a Communist flag. Maybe your pals in Hanoi could lend you one. What you did during the Vietnam War disgraced our servicemen. What would have all those who died for our nation -including the Civil War- think of you and your lies and this corrupt administration? I am praying for a miracle. It seems that you are given a pass for everything. Perhaps your supporters could pay for all the money you ripped off on your trips as SOS to enrich you and your filthy friends. Sincerely, Rick the Vet

replies.author: Jenna
replies.text: Don't you mean Rick the troll

replies.author: Cerra
replies.text: Trump LOST Florida??? Donald must be doing a "Mickey Mouse" job these days!

replies.author: Alex
replies.text: So HC you're a hypocrite! SO HILLARY, YOU WANT TO PLAY THE RACE CARD? CHECK OUT HANNITY TONIGHT.....HE's SHOWING HOW YOU AND EVERYONE IN YOUR CAMPAIGN AND YOUR FAMIIY'S ACTUAL RACIST COMMENTS and FOOTAGE FOR YEARS!!
